events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because the size is completely wrong and does not fit me.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning a product.
The case is assigned to customer service agent Emma to handle the refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I’m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678, and the jacket is still in perfect condition with tags attached. I haven’t worn it at all.

Thank you for the info. I’m initiating the return process now. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid label I’m sending to your email, and once received, we’ll refund your full purchase amount within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick help! I will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
The refund case is now closed on our side after sending you the prepaid return label. Please let us know once you ship the item back.
We wanted to check in to confirm you were able to send the jacket back and ask if you need any additional assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday using the label you provided. Thank you for following up!
We have received your return package and processed your refund today. The amount should appear on your statement within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for contacting us. Your refund case is now officially closed. We hope to serve you again in the future.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
